short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every time you open a new tab in Chrome, you'll be treated to a short video of a surfer getting barreled.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Barrels is a surfing-inspired Chrome extension that adds a fun and exciting twist to your browsing experience. When you install Barrels, every time you open a new tab in Chrome, you'll be treated to a short video of a surfer getting barreled. Whether you're hard at work on your computer or just browsing the web, Barrels will give you a delightful moment of escape as you watch the waves crash and the surfers ride. The videos are carefully selected to showcase the beauty and excitement of surfing, and will transport you to some of the most iconic surf spots around the world. So why not add a little joy to your day with Barrels? Install it today and get ready to catch a wave of inspiration every time you open a new tab.
